node.title: Bezos gives $US100 million to Obama Foundation
node.alt: A man in a suit holds his right hand up as he speaks to a crown at an event.
node.description: Jeff Bezos hands a massive donation to former US president Barack Obama's signature leadership project as he steps up his philanthropy efforts, following criticism that he doesn't give enough.
node.content:
["Former US president Barack Obama's foundation says it has received a $US100 million ($138\u00a0million)\u00a0donation from Amazon founder Jeff Bezos \u2014\u00a0the largest individual contribution it has received.", "The Obama Foundation said the gift from Mr Bezos was\u00a0intended \"to help expand the scope of programming that reaches emerging leaders\" in the United States and around the world.", "The donation, it said, was also given in honour of John Lewis, a\u00a0congressman and civil rights icon who died last year.", "", "
The Obama Foundation's\u00a0mission is to train and inspire tomorrow's leaders.(AP:\u00a0Alberto Pezzali)
", "As part of the gift, the foundation said Mr Bezos had asked for the plaza at the Obama Presidential Center, under construction in Chicago's South Side, to be named after Mr Lewis.", "Valerie Jarrett, a former senior adviser to Mr Obama who serves as the foundation's CEO, said the foundation was \"thrilled\" by that idea.", "Construction on Mr Obama's legacy project is expected to cost about $US830 million\u00a0and be completed by 2025.", "Separately, a medical centre affiliated with New York University\u00a0said it had\u00a0received $US166 million\u00a0from Mr Bezos and his family.", "NYU Langone Health said the donation would be used to help \"with the health and wellness of diverse populations\" in Brooklyn.", "Since stepping down as CEO of Amazon this year, Mr Bezos has begun to focus more of his attention on philanthropy.", "Last year he committed to spend $US10 billion by 2030 to enhance climate change efforts through his Bezos Earth Fund.", "", "
MacKenzie Scott\u00a0has signed The Giving\u00a0Pledge which is aimed at\u00a0persuading\u00a0the world's wealthiest to donate more than half their worth to philanthropic organisations.(Invasion via AP:\u00a0Evan Agostini)
", "Mr Bezos's personal wealth is estimated by Forbes at roughly $US212 billion.", "But he has long been questioned about the relatively modest level of his charitable giving and his reluctance to sign The Giving Pledge.", "The pledge, developed by Bill Gates and Warren Buffett, is intended to persuade the world's wealthiest to donate more than half their worth to philanthropic organisations.", "MacKenzie Scott, Mr Bezos's former wife, whose fortune is estimated at $US61 billion, has signed the pledge.", "Ms Scott has made a splash in the philanthropy world over the past 17 months by donating $US8.7 billion, without\u00a0any strings attached,\u00a0to numerous non-profits across the US.", "AP"]
